name: IPLMania-Trivia-QuizgameonIPLT20Cricket
0:
”Alexa, start i. p. l. mania”
”Alexa, open i. p. l. mania”
”Alexa, ask i. p. l. mania”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. p. l. mania
des:
i. p. l. mania is Trivia Quiz game, which asks 10 multiple choice questions to users. The user has to say between 1 and 4 to answer it. It is that Simple. Alexa keeps tracks of your score and provides it at the end.

Have fun time while you develop your knowledge on i. p. l. T20 Cricket Game.

Questions are from very first 2008 series to current year and every update we work hard to increase the various variety of questions.

Please suggest the improvement in the comments, we will tries to bring it as soon as possible in next update.

If you like please provide your ratings also don't forget to leave your comments.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
